card.name: Agog
card.text: Unique. Ice-orc. Leader. Discard on a body check result of 7. +1 prowess against Elves. +2 EI against Ice-orcs. +2 EI against the Ice-orcs and Orcs of the Bleak Mountains factions. No More Nonsense may be duplicated on Agog. Agog receives +2 to prowess and body when at or moving to a site in The Northern Waste, and +1 prowess if The Witch-king of Angmar is in play.

card.name: Dakalmog
card.text: Unique. Ice-orc. Leader. Discard on a body check result of 9. +2 EI against Orcs. +2 EI against Ice-orcs.

card.name: Durba
card.text: Unique. Ice-orc. Discard on a body check result of 8. +1 prowess if controlling a wolf ally. tap: heal a wolf ally in the company (from wounded to tapped).

card.name: Durlach
card.text: Unique. Balrog. Flying. Can use sorcery. +2 to his company’s Under-deeps movement rolls. Durlach’s prowess is only modified by -1 when not tapping to face a strike. May not have followers and may not move to any site other than his home sites. If not at his home site, he must (attempt to) move to one of his home sites this turn; if this results in illegal movement, return Durlach to his home site and wound him. Durlach may tap to take Great Shadow or Master of Dread and Fear from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Galgrinic
card.text: Unique. + 1 prowess against Dragons and Drakes. +1 EI against Umli. + 2 EI against the Umli Traders faction.

card.name: Heledwen
card.text: Unique. Nando. +1 prowess when Helectil, Light of the North is in play. tap: cancel any ongoing effects of Jaänaïnen for her company.

attr.value: any Elf-hold in the Northern Waste

card.name: Ice-troll
card.text: Wild-troll. Discard on a body check result of 9. +1 prowess against Dwarves. -1/-2 to his prowess and body if not at or moving to a site in The Northern Waste.

attr.value: Any non-Dragon’s lair Ruins & Lairs in the Northern Waste

card.name: Karhunkäsi
card.text: Unique. +2 prowess against Wolves and Bears.-1 to his CPC.-1 to his influence checks.

card.name: Karvainen
card.text: Unique. +1 to his riddling rolls. When Karvainen enters play, he may take control of one minor rune item, which may be taken from your sideboard, discard pile, or hand.

card.name: Kénwe Foryaren
card.text: Unique. Noldo. May use any bow regardless of its card-text. When Kénwe Foryaren comes into play, you may search your play deck (reshuffle) or discard pile for a minor item or short-event with a healing effect. Discard if his company moves to a site not in The Northern Waste or Eriador, or if a Wizard is in his company outside the organization phase.

attr.value: Evermist, any Border-hold in Northern Waste

card.name: Konihrabn
card.text: Unique. Agent. +2 EI against Man factions playable in The Northern Waste or Angmar. Agent only: tap: make any non-unique Orc creature playable on a company leaving his current Border-hold [B] or Ruins & Lairs [R] site in The Northern Waste.

card.name: Kragbogk the Berserker
card.text: Unique. Kragbogk’s prowess is only modified by -1 when wounded. Kragbogk is not affected by any command cards in his company. -3 to his influence attempts.

card.name: Los'pindel
card.text: Unique. Nando. +2 EI against Elf and Man characters and factions normally playable at a site in The Northern Waste. +2 prowess and +1 body when at or moving to a site in The Northern Waste. When Los’pindel is at Helloth, you may keep one more card than normal in your hand. She must make a CP every organization phase while not at a site in The Northern Waste. -2 mp if eliminated.

card.name: Lugronk
card.text: Unique. Half-troll. Balrog only. Leader. +2 EI against Orcs and Trolls. +2 EI against Balrog specific characters. Discard on a body check result of 9. You may play Warden of the Deeps on him if your opponent is any grey player or any non-hazard manifestation of a Balrog or Dragon in play, as if opponent was a Balrog avatar.

card.name: Marin
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess when at or moving to a site in The Northern Waste. +3 prowess against Lossandamundar, if all strikes from such a creature against your company have been defeated, you may bring one Ivory Hoard from your sideboard to your hand, it is playable at any site in the Northern Waste.

card.name: Morvran
card.text: Unique. +1 EI against Men with a home site in Eriador or The Northern Waste. +1 prowess while bearing a treasure. May not be in a company with a hero Elf or Dúnadan with a mind greater than his. Any CP made by Elves in his company is modified by -1.

card.name: Nadash
card.text: Unique. Ice-orc. Discard on a body check resultof 8. If Nadash controls a wolf ally and is at or moving to a site in The Northern Waste, he gains the scout skill.

card.name: Nestador
card.text: Unique. Noldo. +2 EI against Elves. When Nestador is at Evermist, you may keep one more card than normal in your hand. Healing cards and effects affect all characters in his company. -3 mp if eliminated.

card.name: Pitää Kalasta
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess against Animals and Wolves. Any flattery or offering attempt against (characters in) his company is cancelled. Foolish Words does not affect him. tap: cancel a Trap attack against his company.

card.name: Punakäsi
card.text: Unique. Agent. +1 prowess when Mordó is in play. -1 prowess if not at or moving to a site in The Northern Waste. Agent only: May not be revealed at a site that is not in The Northern Waste. tap: make one non-unique Undead creature playable at his current non-Free-hold site.

card.name: Raudabern
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess against Orcs. +2 EI against Umli and characters and factions playable at Ligr Wodaize Berne. Raudabern suffers no prowess penalty when he is tapped or wounded.

card.name: Róin
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess when at or moving to a site in The Northern Waste. tap: take one Profitable Trade from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Sprautabern
card.text: Unique. Grey agent. +1 prowess against Orcsand Wolves. Is considered Beorn for the purpose of playing Skin-changer. Agent only: may move two regions per agent action if moving to a site in The Northern Waste. tap: during movement/hazard phase to attack a company moving to his current Ruins & Lairs [R] or Shadow-hold [S] or to his home site.

card.name: Striuk'ir
card.text: Unique. Nando. +1 prowess against Orcs and Wolves. +2 EI against Elf and Animal factions.

attr.value: any site in a Wilderness in The Northern Waste

card.name: The Angulion
card.text: Unique. Can use sorcery and shadow-magic. tap: during the organization phase to take a magic card from your discard pile to your hand, if you discard a magic card from your hand and wound another character in his company.

card.name: Urdrak
card.text: Unique. Ice-orc. Discard on a body check result of 8. +2 EI against Ice-orcs. Healing effects affect all Orcs in his company. tap: modify the mind of any one Orc at his current site by +1 or -1 this turn.

card.name: Vanha
card.text: Unique. Spirit-namer. +2 EI against Man andUmit characters and factions playable at a site in The Northern Waste. Is considered a Nando for the purpose of playing Healing Song. tap: during the organization phase, if no other characters are in her company, to prevent any hazard creature being played on her company keyed to a region in The Northern Waste this turn.

attr.value: any Border-hold in The Northern Waste
